GSP32vaissu1u:6: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśaṃ kālo dig ātmā mana iti dravyāṇi / KVs_1,1.4 /
GSP32vaissu1u:7: rūparasagandhasparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhayaḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś ca guṇāḥ / KVs_1,1.5 /
GSP32vaissu1u:8: utkṣepaṇam avakṣepaṇam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ gamanam iti karmāṇi / KVs_1,1.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:9: sad anityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavad iti dravyaguṇakarmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ / KVs_1,1.7 /
GSP32vaissu1u:16: kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇam iti dravyalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:17: dravyāśrayy aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.15 /
GSP32vaissu1u:18: ekadravyam aguṇaṃ saṃyogavibhāgeṣv anapekṣaṃ kāraṇam iti karmalakṣaṇam / KVs_1,1.16 /
GSP32vaissu1u:25: dvitvaprabhṛtayaś ca saṃkhyāḥ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgāś ca / KVs_1,1.23 /
GSP32vaissu1u:26: asamavāyāt sāmānyaṃ karma kāryaṃ na vidyate / KVs_1,1.24 /
GSP32vaissu1u:36: dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāś ca / KVs_1,2.5 /
GSP32vaissu1u:41: guṇakarmasu ca bhāvān na karma na guṇaḥ / KVs_1,2.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:51: rūparasasparśavatya āpo dravāḥ snigdhāś ca / KVs_2,1.2 /
GSP32vaissu1u:55: sarpirjatumadhūcchiṣṭānāṃ pārthivānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam / KVs_2,1.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:56: trapusīsaloharajatasuvarṇānāṃ taijasānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam / KVs_2,1.7 /
GSP32vaissu1u:57: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti gotve dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgam / KVs_2,1.8 /
GSP32vaissu1u:59: na ca dṛṣṭānāṃ sparśa ity adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuḥ / KVs_2,1.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:68: vāyor iti sati snnikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_2,1.15 /
GSP32vaissu1u:73: niṣkramaṇaṃ praveśanam ity ākāśasya liṅgam / KVs_2,1.20 /
GSP32vaissu1u:77: kāraṇaguṇapūrvaḥ kārye guṇo dṛṣṭaḥ kāryāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca śabdaḥ sparśavatām aguṇaḥ / KVs_2,1.24 /
GSP32vaissu1u:78: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣatvāc ca nātmaguṇo na manoguṇaḥ / KVs_2,1.25 /
GSP32vaissu1u:82: puṣpavastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe gandhāntarāprādurbhāvo vastre gandhābhāvaliṅgam / KVs_2,2.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:87: aparasmin paraṃ yugapad ayugapac ciraṃ kṣipram iti kālaliṅgāni / KVs_2,2.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:93: ita idam iti yatas tad diśo liṅgam / KVs_2,2.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:97: ādityasaṃyogād bhūtapūrvād bhaviṣyato bhūtāc ca prācī / KVs_2,2.16 /
GSP32vaissu1u:98: tathā dakṣiṇā pratīcy udīci ca / KVs_2,2.17 /
GSP32vaissu1u:100: sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca saṃśayaḥ / KVs_2,2.19 /
GSP32vaissu1u:106: tasmin dravyaṃ karma guṇa iti saṃśayaḥ / KVs_2,2.25 /
GSP32vaissu1u:107: tulyajātīyeṣv arthāntarabhūteṣu ca viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt / KVs_2,2.26 /
GSP32vaissu1u:117: saṃyogād vibhāgāc chabdāc ca śabdaniṣpatteḥ / KVs_2,2.36 /
GSP32vaissu1u:131: anya eva hetur ity anapadeśaḥ / KVs_3,1.7 /
GSP32vaissu1u:142: viṣāṇī tasmād aśvo viṣāṇī tasmād gaur iti ca / KVs_3,1.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:143: ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣād yan niṣpadyate tad anyat / KVs_3,1.13 /
GSP32vaissu1u:144: pravṛttinivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam / KVs_3,1.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:145: ātmendriyārthasannikarṣe jñānasyābhāvo bhāvaś ca manaso liṅgam / KVs_3,2.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:148: prāṇāpānanimeṣonmeṣajīvanamanogatīndriyāntaravikārāḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś cety ātmaliṅgāni / KVs_3,2.4 /
GSP32vaissu1u:150: yajñadatta iti sati sannikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate / KVs_3,2.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:154: yadi ca dṛṣṭapratyakṣo 'haṃ devadatto 'haṃ yajñadatta iti / KVs_3,2.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:155: devadatto gacchati viṣṇumitro gacchatīti copacārāc charīrapratyakṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.11 /
GSP32vaissu1u:157: aham iti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratrābhāvād arthāntarapratyakṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.13 /
GSP32vaissu1u:158: na tu śarīraviśeṣād yajñadattaviṣṇumitrayor jñānaviśeṣaḥ / KVs_3,2.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:170: anekadravyeṇa dravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhiḥ / KVs_4,1.9 /
GSP32vaissu1u:173: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma ca rūpidravyasamavāyāc cākṣuṣāṇi / KVs_4,1.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:175: etena guṇatve bhāve ca sarvendriyajñānaṃ vyākhyātam / KVs_4,1.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:176: pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇām apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate / KVs_4,2.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:177: guṇāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca tryātmakam api na / KVs_4,2.2 /
GSP32vaissu1u:178: ātmasaṃyogas tv avipratiṣiddho mithaḥ pañcānām / KVs_4,2.3 /
GSP32vaissu1u:187: abhighātaje musalakarmaṇi vyatirekād akāraṇaṃ hastasaṃyogaḥ / KVs_5,1.3 /
GSP32vaissu1u:189: musalābhighātāt tu musalasaṃyogād dhaste karma / KVs_5,1.5 /
GSP32vaissu1u:192: nodanaviśeṣābhāvād nordhvaṃ na tiryag gamanam / KVs_5,1.8 /
GSP32vaissu1u:200: iṣāv ayugapat saṃyogaviśeṣāḥ karmānyatve hetuḥ / KVs_5,1.16 /
GSP32vaissu1u:201: nodanād ādyam iṣoḥ karma karmakāritāc ca saṃskārād uttaraṃ tathottaram uttaraṃ ca / KVs_5,1.17 /
GSP32vaissu1u:203: nodanād abhighātāt saṃyuktasaṃyogāc ca pṛthivyāṃ karma / KVs_5,2.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:211: apāṃ saṅghāto vilayanaṃ ca tejasaḥ saṃyogāt / KVs_5,2.9 /
GSP32vaissu1u:214: apāṃ saṃyogād vibhāgāc ca stanayitnuḥ / KVs_5,2.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:215: pṛthivīkarmaṇā tejaḥkarma vāyukarma ca vyākhyātam / KVs_5,2.13 /
GSP32vaissu1u:216: agner ūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyoś ca tiryagpavanam aṇumanasoś cādyaṃ karmety adṛṣṭakāritāni / KVs_5,2.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:219: ātmasthe manasi saśarīrasya sukhaduḥkhābhāvaḥ sa yogaḥ / KVs_5,2.17 /
GSP32vaissu1u:221: apasarpaṇam upasarpaṇam aśitapītasaṃyogaḥ kāryāntarasaṃyogāś cety adṛṣṭakāritāni / KVs_5,2.19 /
GSP32vaissu1u:225: dikkālāv ākāśaṃ ca kriyāvadbhyo vaidharmyān niṣkriyāṇi / KVs_5,2.23 /
GSP32vaissu1u:226: etena karmāṇi guṇāś ca vyākhyātāḥ / KVs_5,2.24 /
GSP32vaissu1u:255: iṣṭarūparasagandhasparśaṃ prokṣitam abhyukṣitaṃ ca tac chuci / KVs_6,2.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:258: ayatasya śucibhojanād abhyudayo na vidyate yamābhāvāt / KVs_6,2.9 /
GSP32vaissu1u:271: idam evaṃguṇam idam evaṃguṇam iti coktam / KVs_7,1.3 /
GSP32vaissu1u:276: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityā dravyanityatvāt / KVs_7,1.8 /
GSP32vaissu1u:279: apsu tejasi vāyau ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvāḥ pākajā na vidyante / KVs_7,1.11 /
GSP32vaissu1u:280: aguṇavato dravyasya guṇārambhāt karmaguṇā aguṇāḥ / KVs_7,1.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:283: aṇor mahataś copalabdhyanupalabdhī nitye vyākhyāte / KVs_7,1.15 /
GSP32vaissu1u:284: kāraṇabahutvāt kāraṇamahattvāt pracayaviśeṣāc ca mahat / KVs_7,1.16 /
GSP32vaissu1u:286: aṇu mahad iti tasmin viśeṣabhāvād viśeṣābhāvāc ca / KVs_7,1.18 /
GSP32vaissu1u:300: rūparasagandhasparśavyatirekād arthāntaram ekatvaṃ tathā pṛthaktvam / KVs_7,2.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:301: tayor nityatvānityatve tejaso rūpasparśābhyāṃ vyākhyāte / KVs_7,2.2 /
GSP32vaissu1u:305: niḥsaṃkhyatvāt karmaguṇānāṃ sarvaikatvaṃ na vidyate / KVs_7,2.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:309: anyatarakarmaja ubhayakarmajaḥ saṃyogajaś ca saṃyogaḥ / KVs_7,2.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:313: yutasiddhyabhāvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete / KVs_7,2.14 /
GSP32vaissu1u:319: saṃyogino daṇḍāt samavāyino viṣāṇāc ca / KVs_7,2.20 /
GSP32vaissu1u:328: iheti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ / KVs_7,2.29 /
GSP32vaissu1u:334: guṇakarmasv asannikṛṣṭeṣu jñānaniṣpatter dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ ca / KVs_8.4 /
GSP32vaissu1u:335: sāmānyaviśeṣeṣu sāmānyaviśeṣābhāvāt tata eva jñānam / KVs_8.5 /
GSP32vaissu1u:338: guṇakarmasu guṇakarmābhāvad guṇakarmāpekṣaṃ na vidyate / KVs_8.8 /
GSP32vaissu1u:339: samavāyinaḥ śvaityāc chvaityabuddheḥ śvete buddhis te kāryakāraṇabhūte / KVs_8.9 /
GSP32vaissu1u:342: ayam eṣa kṛtaṃ tvayā bhojayāinam iti buddhyapekṣaṃ / KVs_8.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:346: bhūyastvād gandhavattvāc ca pṛthivī gandhajñāne / KVs_8.16 /
GSP32vaissu1u:347: tathāpas tejo vāyuś ca rasarūpasparśajñāneṣu rasarūpasparśaviśeṣāt / KVs_8.17 /
GSP32vaissu1u:352: yac cānyat satas tad apy asat / KVs_9.5 /
GSP32vaissu1u:353: asad iti bhūtapratyakṣābhāvād bhūtasmṛter virodhipratyakṣatvāc ca jñānam / KVs_9.6 /
GSP32vaissu1u:357: nāsti ghaṭo geha iti sato ghaṭasya gehasaṃyogapratiṣedhaḥ / KVs_9.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:358: nāsty anyaś candramā iti sāmānyāc candramasaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / KVs_9.11 /
GSP32vaissu1u:359: sad asator vaidharmyāt kārye sad asattā na / KVs_9.12 /
GSP32vaissu1u:365: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhy ekārhtasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam / KVs_9.18 /
GSP32vaissu1u:367: hetur apadeśo liṅgaṃ nimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāraṇam ity anarthāntaram / KVs_9.20 /
GSP32vaissu1u:369: ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt saṃskārāc ca smṛtiḥ / KVs_9.22 /
GSP32vaissu1u:376: ātmasamavāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pañcabhyo 'rthāntaratve hetus tadāśrayibhyaś ca guṇebhyaḥ / KVs_10.1 /
GSP32vaissu1u:377: iṣṭāniṣṭakāraṇaviśeṣād virodhāc ca mithaḥ sukhaduḥkhayor arthāntarabhāvaḥ / KVs_10.2 /
GSP32vaissu1u:378: saṃśayanirṇayayor arthāntarabhāvaś ca jñānāntaratve hetuḥ / KVs_10.3 /
GSP32vaissu1u:379: tayor niṣpattiḥ pratyakṣalaiṅgikābhyāṃ jñānāntaratve hetuḥ / KVs_10.4 /
GSP32vaissu1u:385: ekārthasamavāyiṣu kāraṇāntareṣu darśanād ekadeśa ity ekasmin / KVs_10.10 /
GSP32vaissu1u:386: śiraḥ pṛṣṭham udaraṃ pāṇir iti tadviśeṣebhyaḥ / KVs_10.11 /
GSP32vaissu1u:395: dṛṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ dṛṣṭābhāve prayogo 'bhyudayāya (S omits dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ) / KVs_10.20 /
